name: NedeN
description:
Alone in a world where nothing is as it seems, face your fears and find your way to the truth, but be aware that you're not alone.

 

NedeN, an updated version of our submission for the Global Game Jam 2022!

Original submission here

 

How to play:

Find the exit and defeat all enemies to unlock the gate.

Hide and lure them to your traps or hunt them down in your altered form!

 

Controls:

  • WASD >> Move
  • Space Bar >> Transform
  • Left Shift >> Trap (Sheep) / Dash (Wolf)
  • Mouse Left >> Launch (Wolf only)
  • Hold Esc >> Quit 

 

A game by:

  • Alessandro Violante
  • Damiano Tagliaferri
  • Edoardo Lanterna
  • Emanuele Luigi Andolfi
  • Francesco Giunta
  • Lorenzo Masturzo
